tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment_id INT,
    admission_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchData (
 research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 treatment_id INT,
 research_date DATE,
 outcome VARCHAR(100)
);
CREATE TABLE patients (  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  patient_name VARCHAR(255),  date_of_birth DATE,  gender VARCHAR(10),  diagnosis TEXT );
CREATE TABLE treatments (  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  treatment_name VARCHAR(255),  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),  effectiveness FLOAT,  side_effects TEXT );
CREATE TABLE trials (  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  trial_name VARCHAR(255),  start_date DATE,  end_date DATE,  location VARCHAR(100),  lead_researcher VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE results (  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  trial_id INT,  patient_id INT,  treatment_id INT,  outcome VARCHAR(100),  data_collected JSONB );

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE studies (
    study_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    lead_researcher VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(100),
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    effectiveness VARCHAR(50),
    side_effects VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE conditions (
    condition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    condition_name VARCHAR(100),
    severity VARCHAR(50),
    onset_age INT,
    treatment_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE outcomes (
    outcome_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id UUID,
    patient_id UUID,
    condition_id UUID,
    outcome_description TEXT
);
